00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Linq;
00026 using System.Text;
00027 using Utilities.Cisco.Interfaces;
00028 #endregion
00029 
00030 namespace Utilities.Cisco
00031 {
00035     public class Menu:IDisplay
00036     {
00037         #region Constructor
00038 
00042         public Menu()
00043         {
00044             MenuItems = new List<IMenuItem>();
00045             SoftKeys = new List<SoftKeyItem>();
00046         }
00047 
00048         #endregion
00049 
00050         #region Properties
00051 
00055         public string Title { get; set; }
00056 
00060         public string Prompt { get; set; }
00061 
00065         public List<IMenuItem> MenuItems { get; set; }
00066 
00070         public int X { get; set; }
00071 
00075         public int Y { get; set; }
00076 
00080         public string ImageURL { get; set; }
00081 
00082         public List<SoftKeyItem> SoftKeys { get; set; }
00083 
00084         #endregion
00085 
00086         #region Public Overridden Functions
00087 
00088         public override string ToString()
00089         {
00090             try
00091             {
00092                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00093                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(ImageURL))
00094                 {
00095                     Builder.Append("<CiscoIPPhoneMenu>");
00096                 }
00097                 else
00098                 {
00099                     Builder.Append("<CiscoIPPhoneGraphicFileMenu>");
00100                 }
00101                 Builder.Append("<Title>").Append(Title).Append("</Title><Prompt>")
00102                     .Append(Prompt).Append("</Prompt>");
00103                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ImageURL))
00104                 {
00105                     Builder.Append("<LocationX>").Append(X).Append("</LocationX><LocationY>").Append(Y)
00106                         .Append("</LocationY><URL>").Append(ImageURL).Append("</URL>");
00107                 }
00108                 for (int x = 0; x < MenuItems.Count; ++x)
00109                 {
00110                     Builder.Append(MenuItems[x].ToString());
00111                 }
00112                 for (int x = 0; x < SoftKeys.Count; ++x)
00113                 {
00114                     Builder.Append(SoftKeys[x].ToString());
00115                 }
00116                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(ImageURL))
00117                 {
00118                     Builder.Append("</CiscoIPPhoneMenu>");
00119                 }
00120                 else
00121                 {
00122                     Builder.Append("</CiscoIPPhoneGraphicFileMenu>");
00123                 }
00124                 return Builder.ToString();
00125             }
00126             catch { throw; }
00127         }
00128 
00129         #endregion
00130     }
00131 }
